headline: Realtor.com速 Names the Best Markets for First-Time Homebuyers in 2026
summary: Realtor.com速 today released The Best Markets for First-Time Homebuyers in 2026, identifying the top places where young Americans can put down roots with a mix of affordability, abundant for-sale inventory, local amenities and solid metro-level housing forecasts and economic outlooks. This year's ranking highlights a truth for many first-time buyers: the best opportunities are often found in markets that balance attainable home prices with everyday livability. In 2026 that balance is concentrated
